resources.string: E-Rakt is a application that provides a reliable platform to connect local blood donors with receivers. E-rakt creates a communication platform for Donors and receivers who are in need of blood. It is a useful tool to find compatible blood donors who can receive blood request posts in their local area. This application has been devised keeping in mind the utility it will serve for being user-friendly, easily accessible and foremost, to connect people from each gender and age group (above 18 years) to voluntarily participate in saving the life via. blood contribution. Through this application, a portal is created where the blood doner or the needy one can reach out to the blood donor through Donorâ€™s ID With our noble vision and fuller dedication, we are engaged to spread awareness about the insufficient supply and non-availability of the blood to the needy ones.

However, Bangladesh Thalassemia Foundation has a registration porta to manage donors. We are trying to build an Android App for helping thalassemia patients. By using this app, they can manage donors location-wise easily. Besides, they can find donors using Hospital name. We have also made a link with the most reputed blood donation organization Badhan, Sandhani, Red Crescent Society and Medicine Club . People can find donor through this organizations.
